contentrichtext.text: __NOTOC__ {{Wiktionary}} '''Joseph''' may refer to: ==People== * [[Joseph (given name)]], masculine name * [[Joseph (surname)]] {{solename}} * [[Joseph (son of Jacob)]] * [[Saint Joseph]], husband of Mary the mother of Jesus ==Places== * [[Joseph, Utah]] * [[Joseph, Oregon]] ==Media== * ''[[YosepH]]'', album by Luke Vibert * [[Josef (film)|''Josef'' (film)]], a Croatian television movie from 2011 ===Various works based on the life of Joseph in the Hebrew Bible=== * ''[[Joseph and his Brethren]]'', oratorio by George Frideric Handel * [[Joseph (film)|''Joseph'' (film)]], a German/Italian/American television movie from 1995, which tells the story of Joseph in the Hebrew Bible * [[Joseph (opera)|''Joseph'' (opera)]], by the French composer Étienne Méhul * ''[[Josephslegende]]'', 1914 ballet by Richard Strauss * ''[[Joseph and the Amazing Technicolor Dreamcoat]],'' musical by Andrew Lloyd Webber and Tim Rice * ''[[Joseph: King of Dreams]]'', a 2000 direct-to-video animated musical film ==Other== *[[Joseph (fashion brand)]], retailer founded by Joseph Ettedgui *Joseph, the formal name of [[Big Joe (bell)]], a church bell ==See also== * [[Joe (disambiguation)]], listing other uses of the shortened name * [[Saint Joseph (disambiguation)]], for other saints and places * [[Yosef (disambiguation)]], a variation of the name in Hebrew, and the Dutch [[eye dialect]] of the name * [[Yusuf (disambiguation)]], as rendered in Islam/Arabic * {{intitle|Josef}} {{Disambiguation}} [[Category:Place name disambiguation pages]] [[de:Josef#Bekannte Namensträger]] [[eo:Jozefo#Gravaj Jozefoj]]
